Hello from Madagascar!

After adding new nodes, Hostibox.com adjusted pricing and provide you exclusive offers. All VPS are:
  • Hosted on Dual Xeon E5 nodes
  • managed via SolusVM control panel
  • available instantly
  • on KVM virtualization technology
  • located in USA
  • Unlimited bandwidth
  • Full root access
  • Console access to all servers (VNC)
  • 99.99% network uptime guarantee
  • working both Linux or Windows (and custom OS's)
Our plans :

Only $5 per month lifetime
Order now

Additionnal resources:

Payment Options

If you need any custom configurations please let us know. And if you have any question, feel free to contact us: hello@hostibox.com
